17 October 2021, updated on 28/4/2024: Election Commission of Malaysia (SPR), Tindak Malaysia (2021), Information Malaysia 1987 Yearbook by Berita Publishing Sdn. Bhd. Pg 342- Pg 357, New Straits Times, The Star 3 August 1986

All the percentages for electoral demographics are calculated by Tindak Malaysia.  Ethnic data is an estimate and may have an error range of 1 - 5%. Correction for Ethnicity was done on 28 April 2024. Constituency Data for Kluang and a number of constituencies' data points of Sabah are not available. While every effort has been made to ensure accuracy and completeness of the data, TindakMalaysia Network Services PLT is not repsonsible for any errors or omissions.
